main_window.url_placeholder: Please enter YouTube or Bilibili video links, one per line
main_window.speed_limit_placeholder: Download speed limit (KB/s, leave empty for unlimited)
main_window.exit_with_downloads: There are download tasks in progress, do you want to exit the program?
main_window.please_select_formats: Please select the formats you want to download.
main_window.no_formats_found: No downloadable formats found, please check the link or try again later

settings.title: Settings
settings.language_change_message:
Language settings have been saved!

To apply the new language settings, please manually close the current program and then reopen it.

The program will automatically close after clicking OK.
settings.restart_required_message:
Language settings have been saved!

Please manually reopen the program to apply the new language settings.
settings.minimize_to_tray: Minimize to system tray on close
settings.minimize_to_tray_tooltip: When enabled, closing the program will minimize to system tray instead of exiting completely
settings.start_minimized_tooltip: When enabled, the program will start directly minimized to system tray
settings.debug_mode_tooltip: When enabled, detailed debug information will be displayed
settings.remember_window_position_tooltip: Restore the last window position and size on next startup
settings.reset_confirm_message: Do you want to reset all settings to default values?
settings.reset_successfully: Settings have been reset to default values
settings.auto_hide_progress: Auto hide progress bar when download completes
settings.clear_list_message: Are you sure you want to clear all parsing results? This operation cannot be undone!

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Please describe the problem you encountered in detail. We will handle your feedback as soon as possible.
feedback.description_placeholder:
Please describe the problem you encountered in detail, including:
1. Specific steps when the problem occurred
2. Error messages (if any)
3. Your system environment
4. Other relevant information
feedback.confirm_submit: Are you sure you want to submit your feedback?
feedback.submit_success: Thank you for your feedback! We will carefully handle your issue.
feedback.submit_error: Failed to send feedback, please try again later
feedback.description_required: Please describe the problem you encountered in detail (required)
feedback.email_notice: Since we haven't set up an email server yet, please contact me via email gmrchzh@gmail.com for feedback or submit issues directly on Gitee and GitHub!

subtitle.title: Subtitle Download
subtitle.url_required: Please enter the video link to download subtitles
subtitle.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch subtitles, please try again later
subtitle.preview_not_implemented: Subtitle preview feature not implemented yet
subtitle.select_first: Please select a subtitle file to download
subtitle.confirm_download_all: Are you sure you want to download all {count} subtitles?
subtitle.convert_failed: Format conversion failed, please try again later
subtitle.download_failed: Subtitle download failed, please try again later

help.title: Yeguo IDM Help
help.step1_desc: Paste video link in the input box (supports YouTube, Bilibili, etc.)
help.step2_desc: Click 'Parse' button to get video information and available formats
help.step3_desc: Select the format and quality you want to download in the result list
help.step4_desc: Click 'Download' button to start downloading to the specified folder
help.batch_download: Batch Download - Support playlist batch download
help.netease_music: Netease Music - Support Netease Music link parsing and download
help.subtitle_download: Subtitle Download - Auto download video subtitles
help.format_conversion: Format Conversion - Built-in FFmpeg format conversion
help.paste_link_desc: Paste video link in the input box
help.click_parse_desc: Get video information and available formats
help.start_download_desc: Click download button to start download
help.netease_music_desc: Support NetEase Music link parsing and download
help.check_link: • Confirm if the link is valid
help.mp4_best: • MP4 format has the best compatibility
help.mp3_audio: • MP3 is suitable for audio download
help.help_description: If you encounter problems during use, you can contact me through the following ways:
help.code_description: You can view my latest code repository at any time:
help.thanks: Thank you for choosing to use Yeguo IDM software. This software is intended for personal learning purposes only. Knowledge should be paid for - please do not download paid content from others for distribution or profit! I sincerely trust you!
help.view_latest_code_desc: You can view my latest code repository at any time:

about.title: About Yeguo IDM
about.description: A simple, free, and straightforward video and music download tool
about.supported_platforms: Supports downloading videos from YouTube, Bilibili, and music from NetEase Cloud Music
about.author: Author
about.mit_license: This project is licensed under MIT License
about.thanks_contributors: Built on open source projects, thanks to all contributors
about.thanks_open_source: Thanks to the following open source projects:
about.thanks_for_using: Thank you for using Yeguo IDM!

messages.question: Question
messages.confirm_cancel_parse: Are you sure you want to cancel all parsing tasks?
messages.confirm_stop_downloads: Do you want to stop all ongoing downloads?
messages.please_input_url: Please enter the video or music link to download first
messages.invalid_url_format: Invalid link format, please check and re-enter
messages.netease_parse_failed: NetEase Music parsing failed, please check the link or try again later

history.title: Title
history.redownload_confirm: Do you want to redownload the following video?
history.delete_confirm: Do you want to delete the following record?
history.clear_confirm: Do you want to clear all download history? This operation cannot be undone!
history.added_to_queue: Added to download queue, please click parse button to start download
history.export_failed: Export failed, please try again later
history.clear_failed: Clear failed, please try again later
history.search_failed: Search failed, please try again later

log.title: Log Management
log.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all log content? This operation cannot be undone!
log.export_failed: Log export failed, please try again later
log.clear_failed: Log clear failed, please try again later

shortcuts.title: Shortcut Reference
shortcuts.tip1: Shortcuts can greatly improve operation efficiency, it is recommended to master common shortcuts
shortcuts.tip2: Double-click items in the format list to quickly toggle selection status
shortcuts.tip3: Use Tab key to quickly switch focus between different controls
shortcuts.tip4: Press Enter in the input box to quickly parse video/music
shortcuts.tip5: Input box supports Chinese right-click menu, including undo, copy, paste and other functions
shortcuts.tip6: Netease Music parsing can be paused, resumed or cancelled at any time
shortcuts.tip7: Supports mainstream platforms such as YouTube, Bilibili, Netease Music
shortcuts.tip8: Built-in FFmpeg support, no additional installation required
